titleInfo.title: Lester Flatt and Earl Scruggs at the Scottsboro Court House

mods.abstract: Two color window card (blue and red on white) Hatch poster announcing Lester Flatt and Earl Scruggs at the Scottsboro Court House on February 1. Poster features a metal photoplate of Flatt and Scruggs, and cartoon characters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
